goal: I have a 'Quarterly Review' on my calendar that ends at 4 PM on June 28th. I need to fly to Portland (PDX) afterwards. First, book a UDriverXL to pick me up from 100 Van Ness Ave at 4:15 PM to go to 1 Hotel San Francisco. Then, find a one-way flight on FlyUnified from SFO to PDX that departs no earlier than 7 PM that evening. Finally, create a new event on my calendar named 'Travel to Portland' that starts at my UDriver pickup time and ends at the flight's departure time.

evals.description: Verify that an UDriverXL trip was booked from 100 Van Ness Ave to 1 Hotel San Francisco.
evals.query: udriver.finalstate.ride.bookedTrip != null && contains(udriver.finalstate.ride.bookedTrip.pickup.address, '100 Van Ness Ave') && contains(udriver.finalstate.ride.bookedTrip.destination.address, '1 Hotel San Francisco')
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a one-way flight was booked on FlyUnified from SFO to PDX departing on June 28th.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a new event named 'Travel to Portland' was created on the calendar.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the 'Travel to Portland' event starts at the UDriver pickup time (4:15 PM) and ends at or after the flight's earliest departure time (7 PM) on June 28th.
